content.description: Stand start on the left leaning rail make a move to gain the lip traverse right on the lip top out on the right side of the boulder
content.location: on the trail side boulder with the left leaning rail in the middle facing the "turtle boulder"

content.description: Sit start w/ bad feet, hands low on the left leaning rail. make a move or two up the rail toss for the lip and top out. supposedly a key foot hold has broken making the start harder.
content.location: on the small trail side boulder facing the "Turtle Boulder"

content.description:
Awesome compression line on all natural features.

Sit start on the right side of the smoke me boulder, your left hand low with a left heel hook your right hand on a arete feature. make a long move out left to a opposing arete throw up a right heel and squeeze your way to the top.
content.location: On the small trail side boulder facing the "turtle boulder" right next to the main trail.

content.description: Sit start with a obvious vertical right hand side pull and a sloping rail for the left hand make 1 long move to a jug then take it straight up on edges w/ good feet.
content.location: Obvious line on the boulder on the far right side of the "Turtle Boulder" located as the name implies behind a "bush" now more of a tree.
